name: Alien Go Boom
description:
Controls: 

Move:    WASD / Arrow Keys 

Shoot:   Spacebar

press ENTER when you have typed your display-name in the menu. 

__________________________________________________________

Hello!

This is an old project I made, that I recently remastered to put up here on itch. 

The game is not in active development, but if you find any bugs while playing, please write a comment and I'll see if I can fix it :)

The game doesn't have music and is missing audio for certain features, such as menus.
